title: Protest grow calling for President resignation
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The country is facing several crises at the present and people are suffering due to these crises.
People affected by fuel, gas, and electricity shortages continue to protest demanding authorities take quick measures to address the shortages.
On Thursday (7) people took to the streets demanding an immediate end to the current regime.
A ritual was also organized at the sacred Bo Tree in Athakmeemana on Thursday (7) night demanding the president to resing.
Man shot-dead in Theldeniya; Four men carried out the murder
